spec_data.Name: perl-CPANPLUS-Shell-Default-Plugins-Changes
spec_data.Description:
This plugin allows you to display the Changes (or Changelog, ChangeLog,
etc) file of a module to get an overview of what (according to the
maintainer) has changed.
spec_data.Signature: RSA/SHA256, Fri 28 Jul 2017 08:19:52 AM EDT, Key ID f55e7430f5282ee4
spec_data.Summary: View a module's Changes file from the CPANPLUS shell
